title: New Patient Outcome Assessed in Psoriasis Biologic Trial - Medscape

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: WHO-5 scores improved from 53.7 to 65.9 over two years in POSITIVE trial.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Use visual dashboards to track patient-reported outcomes daily for better adherence.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸ”´ URGENT]**: FDA requiring PRO data in trials within 12 months, accelerating ePRO adoption.
**CONCERN**: Self-selection bias may skew results toward healthier patients.
